t: How to Search Amazon's Marketplace to see if a Brand Name is Already i – TrademarKraft
s: In the search bar, type the brand name you want to check, enclosing it in quotation marks (e.g., "Acme Brand"). Using quotation marks around the brand name ensures that Amazon's search algorithm looks for that exact phrase, rather than treating each word individually.
